title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to establish an effective real annual rate of interest at 6 percent for special obligations issued to the Social Security trust funds.
content: Preserving Social Security Act of 2001 - Amends title II (OASDI) of the Social Security Act with regard to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund to revise requirements for the issuance of obligations for purchase by the Funds. Establishes an effective annual rate of interest at six percent for such obligations.
